task_completion.description: The degree to which the task goal has been accomplished

indicators_of_progress.description: To what extent the user is progressing towards the goal based on given feedback

action_validity.description: The validity of actions taken by the user considering provided available actions

action_sequence.description: The order of actions taken to perform the task and achieve the goal

thought_process.description: How well the user thinks and plans for future actions based on the current condition

termination_decision.description: The ability of the user to decide when to terminate the task
